mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO voyageone_cms2.cms_zz_worktable_se_superfeed_full ( upc, code, `size`, category, cost, brand, vo_cost, img_id, color, size_type, product_type, saved, md5 ) VALUES
(#{bean.upc}, #{bean.code}, #{bean.size}, #{bean.category}, #{bean.cost}, #{bean.brand}, #{bean.vo_cost}, #{bean.img_id}, #{bean.color}, #{bean.size_type}, #{bean.product_type}, #{bean.saved}, #{bean.md5})
mapper.select: SELECT id, upc, code, size, category, cost, brand, vo_cost, img_id, color, size_type, product_type, saved, md5 FROM voyageone_cms2.cms_zz_worktable_se_superfeed_full WHERE saved = 0;
